outputs.output_descr:
The NCSA document is envisioned to provide key national decisions-makers as well as external funding agencies with 
critical information about the country's specific capacity needs to protect the global environment. The overall objective of the
project is to identify priority capacity needs related to global environmental management in the Philippines and examine any 
barriers to effectively addressing these needs that exist.

project_descr: National Capacity Needs Self - Assessment for Global Environmental Management in the Philippines
